com.qtplaf.library.database.rdbms.sql

Class Statement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.database.rdbms.sql.Statement
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddCheck, AddField, AddForeignKey, AddPrimaryKey, CreateIndex, CreateSchema, CreateTable, Delete, DropConstraint, DropField, DropForeignKey, DropIndex, DropPrimaryKey, DropSchema, DropTable, Insert, Select, Update

    public abstract class Statement
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class that all SQL statements should extend.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
